title: New jersey  1930s, early 50s in color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of New jersey  Late 30s and early 50s, we start with the ferry/train building of lackawanna railroad hoboken  Late 30s , then a wide shot of people leaving the building, probably the ferry that has just arrived. after a drive through the George Washington Bridge early 50s , Next, we have shots of the industrial city in northern New Jersey.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design  only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: Internet Archive
B&W Video Source: https://archive.org/details/pet1098r5
B&W Video Source: https://archive.org/details/misccan2a17h
